p: A special thank you to all the museum professionals who welcomed us into their space, and to the visitors from around the world for sharing their time and their stories with us. We are grateful to graduate students Daniel Atkinson, Kristen Schaffer, and Zoya Padamski for their assistance with data collection and for their insights and enthusiasm. Thank you to the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada (SSHRC) grant #30124 and MITACS for funding our work and making this possible. Finally, our paper makes use of excerpts from an earlier publication: Pedretti, E., and Navas Iannini, A.M. (2020). These excerpts were reproduced with permission of Taylor and Francis through PLSclear.
